data.title: Membership
data.text:
Benefits

By becoming a member of DARI, you are providing a direct infusion of capital to grow Rock Island businesses, support downtown growth and sustainability, and help to increase the quality of life for all in Rock Island.

As a member, you have access to great networking opportunities as part of it’s monthly board meeting. DARI’s board of directors are a diverse network of influential business leaders all passionate and committed to strengthening Rock Island.

Attending DARI monthly meetings provides you with insight on activities on a local and national level that you won’t experience anywhere else. DARI is connected to industry leaders throughout the nation that provide a unique perspective on national trends that impact our community on a local level, specifically when it comes to legislative activities, policy, tax credits, and real estate.

Employees of DARI members are eligible to participate in the Live-Work RI program, an Employer Assisted Housing Program. Eligible employees receive down payment and closing cost assistance when purchasing a home anywhere in Rock Island. Employees receive an average of $5,400 in direct assistance, making this a great talent attraction and retention tool for employers.

Investment

Your investment in DARI is a meaningful economic tool for the entire community, residents of Rock Island, and the greater Quad Cities region. DARI membership investment ranges from $1,500 to $5,775. The amount recommended for membership is based on a variety of factors, but employee base is a primary consideration.
